short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import and sync products from AliExpress to your Shopify store

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Login the app Dropshipman in your shopify store
2. Go to Aliexpress.com
3. Start using the extension when you browse categories, store, wishlist or search for products on AliExpress
4. Bulk add products in categories or search page required that the page scroll to the bottom for AliExpress have loads the products.
